page.title: 11SHEEP BREEDING by NICK
page.content: On our farm we buy South Wales Mountain ewes which are 4 or 5 years old.We buy them in September and put them to the ram.We use Suffolk cross Texel rams. The lambs are born in mid February to the end of March.We inject the lambs and worm the ewes.At the end of May we sell some lambs fat and the others are weaned off from their mothers and separated for life.At the end of July we sell the ewes and the lambs are sold slowly through the months.Last year we had some lambs left at lambing time so we sold them as store lambs. Each year we buy 100 ewes and sell 130 lambs. We feed the lambs on oats and barley. The lambs make about Â£32 to Â£33 each.
